ai-anya-e0901n0:0_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-anya-e0901n0:4_0: Questioning down from the tomorrow, without questioning,
ai-anya-e0901n0:5_1: The First Mahākassapa at the time, Reverend Mahākassapa, bestowed the Mahākassapa at the most excellent Mahākassapa and stopped the Vinaya from time—this is called the Mahākassapa.
ai-anya-e0901n0:6_1: The First Mahākassapa, chief of the preachers of the Dhamma, chief of the Vinaya, driven out from the first Vinaya, and arrived (the immediately) on the Dhamma.
ai-anya-e0901n0:7_1: Reverends, those two discourses purification in the teaching is the first thing.
ai-anya-e0901n0:8_1: In the two principles they specifically recited.
ai-anya-e0901n0:9_1: The Linked Discourses on the Simile of the Dīgha reciters of the Five Pañcakaṅga at the Deer Pañcakaṅga. They were the first very longhouses.
ai-anya-e0901n0:10_0: * Now, venerable Sir, drew up to the five lower fetters
ai-anya-e0901n0:11_1: Longer Discourses in the four ways of being long and wide, and the dogs have been firmly done first and well awakened to heaven.
ai-anya-e0901n0:12_1: In the first three chapters of those who are ethical and well-proclaimed aggregates they were the first to bed.
